summary: Repeated dishonesty can lead to a loss of trust, resulting in serious consequences when honesty is truly needed.
A person's credibility is crucial, as it determines whether others will believe them in critical situations.
Constantly raising false alarms can desensitize others, leading to inaction when genuine danger arises.

keyphrase: Facing the outcomes of one's actions
summary: Individuals must face the repercussions of their actions, especially when their behavior has been misleading.
Being unreliable can lead to being ignored or dismissed, even in times of genuine need.
